General.Name: ALi Corp
General.Description: ALi Corporation engages in the research, development, design, and sale of chipsets for consumer electronic products in Hong Kong, Mainland China, Korea, Taiwan, France, Singapore, and internationally. It develops and sells set-top box (STB) system-on-chips. The company's products include mirror dongles, Pico projectors, robot vacuum cleaners, and various home appliances with voice control. It provides its STB solutions for digital satellite, digital cable, and digital terrestrial STB, as well as H.264 HD or SD STB applications; smart display solution to HDMI dongle and Pico projector; smart mobile robot, including consumer robots and commercial service robots; human machine interfaces; and smart speakers and voice controllers. The company was formerly known as Acer Laboratories, Inc. and changed its name to ALi Corporation in 2002. ALi Corporation was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
